contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quemperven |native name = Kemperven |latitude = 48.7258 |longitude = -3.3208 |INSEE = 22257 |postal code = 22450 |department = Côtes-d'Armor |arrondissement = Lannion |canton = La Roche-Derrien |mayor = Philippe Weisse |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Centre Trégor |elevation min m = 28 |elevation max m = 93 |area km2 = 7.69 |population = 383 |population date = 2008 }} '''Quemperven''' ({{Lang-br|Kemperven}}) is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Côtes-d'Armor]] [[Departments of France|department]] of [[Brittany (administrative region)|Brittany]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== Inhabitants of Quemperven are called ''quempervennois'' in French. ==Breton language== The municipality launched a linguistic plan through [[Ya d'ar brezhoneg]] on July 7, 2006. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Côtes-d'Armor department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.culture.gouv.fr/public/mistral/merimee_fr?ACTION=CHERCHER&FIELD_98=INSEE&VALUE_98=22257 French Ministry of Culture list for Quemperven] {{Fr icon}} {{Côtes-d'Armor communes}} [[Category:Communes of Côtes-d'Armor]] {{CôtesArmor-geo-stub}}
